title: California Cooks!
description: CALIFORNIA COOKS! gives the reader a kaleidoscopic view of California's vast cooking pot -- stirred by the excitement of the many ethnic groups that live and cook here and blended with the geographic elements of the sea, mountains, deserts and valleys (from Preface).Sections include:Ole Recipes North of the BorderCasual Beach Cities CookeryDelicacies of the DesertLush Valley Ways with FruitLos Angeles Market BasketHeady Aromas from the High SierraOld World Sheep CountryFoods from the Cities by the Golden GateRecipes from the Valleys of the VintnersThe Best from "Little China"
author: Rowena McLean Marks
